roleset.name: conforming to specific dietary laws of Judaism

role.descr: eater who follows Jewish dietary laws

example.name: arg1
example.text: The most annoying thing of all: all the amazing-looking food that-1 *T*-1 isn't kosher.

example.name: arg0
example.text: I'm kosher so I can't eat parmesan with sausage but the onions sound great!

roleset.name: alright, allowable
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on SMS. Comparison to 'ok-j.01'.

example.name: arg1
example.text: I just wanted to put that out there , would hate to get the lil guy sick . Totally understand if that is n't kosher .
